head.title: rTorrent
head.intro: [rTorrent](https://rakshasa.github.io/rtorrent/) is a command-line torrent application. Here are some shortcut keys.

body.title: Main view
body.elms:
| Shortcut | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `bksp` | Add torrent |
| --- | --- |
| `->` | View download |
| --- | --- |
| `1` _-_ `7` | Change view |
| --- | --- |
| `^S` | Start download |
| `^D` | Stop download (or remove stopped) |
| `^K` | Close a torrent |
| --- | --- |
| `+` _/_ `-` | Change priority |
{: .-shortcuts}

body.title: Throttling
body.elms:
#### Upload

| `a` _/_ `s` _/_ `d` | Increase upload throttle by 1/5/50 KB   |
| `z` _/_ `x` _/_ `c` | Decrease upload throttle by 1/5/50 KB   |
{: .-shortcuts}

#### Download

| `A` _/_ `S` _/_ `D` | Increase download throttle by 1/5/50 KB |
| `Z` _/_ `X` _/_ `C` | Decrease download throttle by 1/5/50 KB |
{: .-shortcuts}

body.title: Download view
body.elms:
| `1` _/_ `2` | Adjust max uploads |
| `3` _/_ `4` | Adjust min peers   |
| `5` _/_ `6` | Adjust max peers   |
{: .-shortcuts}
